news.title: City Library Extends Hours During Exam Season
news.body: The central city library announced extended opening hours to support students preparing for exams. Librarians will also hold nightly study groups and provide free access to online research tools.

comments.text: This is a lifesaver, thank you to the library team.

news.title: Neighborhood Cafe Hosts Open Mic Night
news.body: A local cafe is hosting an open mic night to showcase emerging musicians and poets. Entry is free and the event encourages creative collaboration across the community.

news.title: Local Clinic Offers Free Health Screenings
news.body: A nearby clinic will offer free health screenings for blood pressure, diabetes and general check-ups over the weekend. Appointments recommended but walk-ins welcome.
